name: tuyens-agent-skills
description: Marketplace for Tuyen's Agent Skills plugins: java, kotlin, python, rails, node, and go.

plugins.name: core
plugins.description: 42 skills (14 workflow + 28 atomic) for multi-stack development - auto-detects any tech stack from CLAUDE.md

plugins.name: java
plugins.description: 11 skills and 8 agents for Java 21+ / Spring Boot 3.5+ development. Requires core plugin.

plugins.name: kotlin
plugins.description: 5 skills and 1 agent for Kotlin 2.0+ / Spring Boot 3.5+ development. Requires core and java plugins.

plugins.name: python
plugins.description: 9 skills and 3 agents for Python 3.11+ / FastAPI / Django development. Requires core plugin.

plugins.name: rails
plugins.description: 8 skills and 3 agents for Ruby on Rails 7+/8 development. Requires core plugin.

plugins.name: node
plugins.description: 9 skills and 3 agents for Node.js/TypeScript development. Requires core plugin.

plugins.name: go
plugins.description: 8 skills and 3 agents for Go/Gin development. Requires core plugin.
